title.native: 八男って、それはないでしょう！
title.romaji: Hachi-nan tte, Sore wa Nai deshou!
title.english: The 8th Son? Are You Kidding Me?

description:
Ichinomiya Shingo, a 25-year-old man working at a firm company, while thinking of tomorrow's busy working day, goes to sleep. However, when he woke up, he found himself in a room unknown to him and realized that he is inside a 6-years-old body, taking over his body and mind.

He soon learns from the memories of the boy that the boy was born as the youngest child of a poor noble family living in a back country. Having no administrative skill, he can't do anything to manage the vast land his family has.

Fortunately, he is blessed with a very rare talent, the talent of magic. Unfortunately, while his talent could bring prosperity to his family, in his situation it only brought disaster. This is the story of the boy, Wendelin Von Benno Baumeister, opening his own path in a harsh world.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ผมเนี่ยนะ...ชายแปด!

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Spearplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of spears in combat.

node.description:
[Website](http://www.fuzichoco.com) | [Blog](http://fuzichoko.blog39.fc2.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fuzichoco) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fuzichoco) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=27517)

Began her professional career as early as highschool. Has an uncommon sense of colour depth among modern Japanese illustrators. Her work already expanded outside illustration for anime, manga and novels. She draws for outdoor campaigns, museums, and even was featured in TV shows as well. 
She now resides in Tokyo, Japan.

**Height:** 163cm

Akino Kawamitsu, better known by her stage name AKINO, is an American-born Japanese pop singer, from Utah. Originally debuting in 2003 with her brothers Akashi and Aiki and her sister Kanasa in the band bless4, Akino made her solo debut in 2005 singing the opening themes of the TV anime Sousei no Aquarion. Her debut album "Lost in Time" was released in 2007 under her new stage name, AKINO from bless4. All of her songs are composed by Yoko Kanno.

[Website](https://demon-kakka.jp/index.php)

Demon is an Akuma (an evil kind of kami) masquerading in the human realm. He is the former vice-king of Jigoku (Hell) and the founder of Akumakyou (a demoniac religion).  Kogure preached his "religion" as the leader of [Seikima-II](https://anilist.co/staff/202525/), a religious group whose aim is to conquer the earth via heavy metal music. In mid-2009 he changed his persona to Demon Kakka ("His Excellency Demon").

(Source: Wikipedia)
Arika Takarano is a singer and takes part in the music project [ALI PROJECT](https://anilist.co/staff/100631/ALI-PROJECT).

name.native: カテリーナ古楽合奏団

node.description:
__[Website](http://www.roba-house.com/cathe.html)__ | __[Profile (Members)](http://www.roba-house.com/robapro.html#men)__

__Formed:__ 1973
__Genre:__ Classical

__Introduction:__
Catherina Kogaku Gassoudan is a Japanese music ensemble who mainly plays music from the Renaissance and middle ages. They have been performing in the so called "Roba House", which is a classical music hut located in Tachikawa, Tokyo.

__Members:__
- Garyu Matsumoto (松本雅隆) – plays the hurdy-gurdy, psaltery, bag pipe, crumhorn, cornet, rackett, pan flute, recorder, etc
- Tessey Ueno (上野哲生) – plays the santoor, psaltery, lute, bağlama, etc
- Junnosuke Chiba (千葉潤之介) – plays the viol, recorder, crumhorn, etc
- Kazuaki Nagai (長井和明) – plays the serpent, sackbut, crumhorn, recorder, etc
- Kazuhisa Saitou (斉藤和久) – plays the fiddle, viol, etc
- Sarasa Matsumoto (松本更紗) – plays the voil and tromba marina, in addition to dancing, etc
- Reo Sai (蔡怜雄) – plays the santoor, tombak, goblet drum, daf, medieval drum, etc
- Kei Okada (岡田啓) – plays the qatar, rackett, crumhorn, etc

__Former Members:__
- Takahiro Kitasato (北里孝浩) – plays the shawn, recorder
- Kimihiro Matsumoto (松本公博) – plays the cister, viol
- Haruo Shinakawa (品川治夫) – plays the qatar, crumhorn, recorder
- Masaaki Kawamura (川村正明) – plays the shawn
- Fumiharu Yoshimine (吉嶺文晴) – plays the recorder, crumhorn
- Yoshimichi Hamada (濱田芳通) – plays the zink, crumhorn
- Christopher Hardy (クリストファー・ハーディ) – plays percussion instruments
- Yuuji Kamata (畑田祐二) – plays the recorder
- Masamichi Sanguu (三宮正満) – plays the shawn

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kat.njima)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kat_njima)**

**Katsuhiro Nakajima** is a Japanese sound effects creator/editor working for [Swara Production](https://anidb.net/creator/3214).

[Website](https://demon-kakka.jp/index.php)

In mid-2009 he changed his persona to Demon Kakka ("His Excellency Demon").

(Source: Wikipedia)
